Funeral Loss Assumption Mary Prayer Sympathy Cards

Review Funeral Loss Assumption Mary Prayer Sympathy Cards – Sympathy Cards This item is trending! Funeral Loss Assumption Mary Prayer Sympathy Cards good product Funeral Loss Assumption Mary Prayer Sympathy Cards There are many features Assumption of Mary Tribute Prayer Cards

In honor of your cherished departed and their devotion to the Assumption of Mary, we present the Assumption of Mary Tribute Prayer Cards. Each card features a captivating painting depicting the Assumption of Mary, surrounded by angels, offering solace and remembrance during this time of reflection. With the enchanting image of the Assumption of Mary on the front and a cherished photo of your loved one on the back, these prayer cards serve as a heartfelt tribute to their memory.

Divine Comfort: As you reflect on the painting of the Assumption of Mary, may her celestial presence bring you comfort and peace. Let the serene image of her Assumption serve as a source of solace and strength as you navigate through grief.

Eternal Guidance: The Assumption of Mary symbolizes her exaltation and eternal glory in Heaven. Let her example inspire and uplift you, guiding you through moments of sorrow with grace and fortitude.

Heartfelt Tribute: Each card honors the profound faith and devotion of your loved one, depicted alongside the Assumption of Mary on the front. On the back, alongside their photo, there is space for a personalized message or prayer, allowing you to express your deepest sentiments with reverence and sincerity.

Eternal Blessings: As you hold these prayer cards in your hands, may you feel the celestial embrace of the Assumption of Mary and the comforting presence of your cherished departed. May her intercession continue to console and uplift you, bringing comfort and hope in your time of need.

Embrace the sacred devotion to the Assumption of Mary through the Assumption of Mary Tribute Prayer Cards, a heartfelt tribute to a life enriched by faith and devotion to the Blessed Mother. Price:$29.00
